Title: Kobito to Ao Mushi
Description: ["A musical movie about a tiny village with tiny people. A tiny child fed a starving caterpillar his last rice cake. There was a race held soon after to determine who the king will be. The caterpillar had become a butterfly and as a thank you, pulled the tiny child's race car."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo', 'Other: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo']
